title: Samsung now sells refurbished Galaxy S21 phones for less money
content:
Samsung released the Galaxy S21, Galaxy S21 Plus, and Galaxy S21 Ultra last year, which continued to be the company’s flagship devices until the Galaxy S22 series arrived in February. Now that the company has been selling the S21 series for over a year, and likely has many of them on-hand from S22 trade-ins, Samsung

The post Samsung now sells refurbished Galaxy S21 phones for less money appeared first on xda-developers.
